column5: Another great day out on hard water...  Fishlips managed to haul in a lot of big fish today, outfishing both lefty and I using a small buckshot and a Big N Float...  We were fishing out of St. Williams, about 107 fish caught between the three of us, what a day.  A special thank you to Propers Fish Huts for helping us get on the fish today...  Get out there while the bite is on!  A reminder to carry your licences, insurance and ownerships, wear your helmets if running out on sleds or quauds.  Ministry was there checking everyone that came in ... Watch your limits, it's 50 perch per person...  Ice was 12" to 13" in close and varies out by EC-10 from 12" to 6" in some spots. Water was clear in some spots and not in others.
That first Perch is a biggin. Good stuff.
Those are some nice looking perch they will make a nice dinner  rob
Looks like a good day! I sent you a PM by the way, I tried calling but I must have missed you.
March 8th?? I must be in a time warp, still 1.5 hrs. to go for me until that date,   :lol:  :lol:  Nice fish btw.
oops caught that, was late when I did my post... all fixed
Awesome day Steve  Quite a feed there.  Is the pressure crack tough to get over to access EC-10?  Cheers  Craig
There is no need to go out to EC-10 we fished there all morning not even a bite ..ice was thin out there also ..ended up fishing right close to shore around all the huts ..
